name: Angel Wings
effect:
:effect_map: Chosen [Hero](../heroes/index.md) gain +1 :movement: and can move through any fields without resolving them. The last visited field must be resolved normally.

— OR —

:instant: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Not really wanting to know where the Angel, whose wings these belong to, is, you take the wings and quickly depart.
notes: After playing Angel Wings, the hero may move through borders and blocked fields. They may, however, not end their movement on a blocked field.
